data.title: Periodic Table of Synthpop
data.text:
Electronic Music

[Compilation #209]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Electronic Music.

This compilation includes 15 of my favorite electronic music tracks, mainly from the 1990s.

Alphaville Rare & Unreleased

[Compilation #208]

Download the brand new PToS online compilation: Alphaville Rare & Unreleased.

This compilation includes rare and unreleased Alphaville songs, reversions and official remixes.

Yazoo Covers 2

[Compilation #207]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Yazoo Covers 2.

This compilation brings together 15 Yazoo songs interpreted by another synthpop (and related genres) artists. It includes Covenant, Spray, Psyche, Sigue Sigue Sputnik, and Susanna Hoffs, among others!

Synth Sweden

[Compilation #206]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Synth Sweden.

This compilation includes synthpop songs by swedish artists. It includes Covenant, Kite, Backlash, Sonic Reunion, Sadman, iamamiwhoami, Code 64, kiethevez, and many more.

A Flock of Seagulls – The More You Live, The More You Love (Multitrack)

[Multitrack #014]

Download the 15 original studio tracks (in WAV format) of A Flock of Seagulls – The More You Live, The More You Love (Multitrack).

It includes all the stems to make your own versions and remixes of the song. Also, you can listen to all tracks separately to know all the details of the track, some of them buried in the mix.

Pet Shop Boys Rare & Unreleased 10

[Compilation #205]

Download the brand new PToS online compilation: Pet Shop Boys Rare & Unreleased 10.

This compilation includes rare and unreleased PSB songs, reversions and official remixes. This volume also includes one of the West End girls unreleased remixes done in 2020, included on a double 12″ pack by High Fashion Music.

MidTempo 2

[Compilation #204]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: MidTempo 2.

This compilation includes synthpop (and related genres) tracks that has a tempo between 90 and 120 BPM. Not ballads, nor upbeat music. It includes original songs, versions and remixes of Depeche Mode, The KLF, Telex, Midge Ure, Banderas, Future Islands and One Dove, among others.

Best of 1989

[Compilation #203]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Best of 1989.

This compilation includes my favorite synthpop, new wave (and related genres) songs released during the year 1989. It includes tracks by New Order, Camouflage, Hubert Kah, Depeche Mode, Pet Shop Boys, Duran Duran, The Mobile Homes, and Celebrate the Nun, among others.

OMD Rare & Unreleased

[Compilation #202]

Download the brand new PToS online compilation: OMD Rare & Unreleased.

This compilation includes rare and unreleased Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark songs, reversions and official remixes.

Ambient 2

[Compilation #201]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Ambient 2.

This compilation includes 15 tracks in ambient mood: ambient mixes, songs or reversions from synthpop (and related genres) artists. It includes Depeche Mode, The Beloved, Camouflage, Pet Shop Boys, Monaco, and The Grid, among others.

Synth Canada

[Compilation #200]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Synth Canada.

This compilation includes synthpop and new wave (and related genres) songs by canadian artists, from the 80s to present. It includes Men Without Hats, Electric Youth, Kon Kan, Destroyer, Spoons, and TR/ST, among others.

Retrowave 4

[Compilation #199]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Retrowave 4.

This compilation includes recent songs with a deep 80’s sound. It is not synthwave, it is not new wave. It is music done in the 21st century, but it sounds like 1986! It includes tracks by Missing Words, Crozet, Juno Dreams, Roosevelt, Laura Mvula, Siamese Youth, Le Cassette and many more!

Electronic Rare & Unreleased

[Compilation #198]

Download the brand new PToS online compilation: Electronic Rare & Unreleased.

This compilation includes rare and unreleased Electronic songs, reversions and official remixes.

Depeche Mode – Personal Jesus Multitrack

[Multitrack #013]

Download the eight original studio tracks (in WAV format) of Depeche Mode – Personal Jesus.

It includes all the stems to make your own versions and remixes of the song. Also, you can listen to all tracks separately to know all the details of the track, some of them buried in the mix.

Best of 1988

[Compilation #197]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Best of 1988.

This compilation includes my favorite synthpop, new wave (and related genres) songs released during the year 1988. It includes tracks by Dead or Alive, Camouflage, Pet Shop Boys, O.K., Erasure, Cetu Javu, Peter Schilling, Moev, and Duran Duran, among others.

SynthGems 3

[Compilation #196]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: SynthGems 3.

This compilation brings together some of the most underrated tracks of the genre; unknown, but beautiful modern synthpop songs. It includes tracks by Wolfsheim, Torul, Covenant, Wiegand, Seven Red Seven, Portland, Nikonn, and many more.

Side Order

[Compilation #195]

Download the brand new PToS online compilation: Side Order.

This compilation includes rare tracks, versions and remixes by side projects of New Order’s members. It includes Electronic, The Other Two, Monaco, Revenge, and Bad Lieutenant, among others.

PSB Influenced

[Compilation #194]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: PSB Influenced.

This compilation includes songs influenced by Pet Shop Boys, intentionally or not. It includes tracks by Momus, KLF, Dubstar, Celebrate the Nun, Lorraine, Nordstrøm, Neon Lights, Hurts, and The Sound of Arrows, among others.

Then/Now 4

[Compilation #193]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Then/Now 4.

Many times you may have asked yourself “what is the life of that artist of the ’80s today?”. Many of those synthpop/new wave artists who peaked in popularity during the ’80s or ’90s are still working today or have released material from time to time beyond the year 2000. I set out to put together the best songs that those artists released during this century, and here’s the result.

This compilation brings together 18 songs by synthpop/new wave (and related genres) artists that you may have lost track of. It includes Pet Shop Boys, OMD, Simple Minds, Duran Duran, Kon Kan, Depeche Mode, Hubert Kah, among others!

New Order – Jetstream Multitrack

[Multitrack #012]

Download the eight original studio tracks (in WAV format) of New Order – Jetstream.

It includes all the stems to make your own versions and remixes of the song. Also, you can listen to all tracks separately to know all the details of the track, some of them buried in the mix.

Best of 1987

[Compilation #192]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Best of 1987.

This compilation includes my favorite synthpop, new wave (and related genres) songs released during the year 1987. It includes tracks by Camouflage, Pet Shop Boys, Erasure, New Order, When in Rome, Secession, and The Cure, among others.

Acoustic 9

[Compilation #191]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Acoustic 9.

This compilation brings together 15 songs by synthpop/new wave (and related genres) artists in acoustic versions. It includes Simple Minds, Gene Loves Jezebel, Silver Pozzoli, Psyche, Hurts, and D:ream, among others.

Sax Songs

[Compilation #190]

Download the brand new PToS free online compilation: Sax Songs.

This compilation includes synthpop and new wave songs (and related genres) which include a saxophone. It includes Pet Shop Boys, Secession, Crozet, Guru Josh, Icehouse, Swing Out Sister, and Men at Work, among others.

Sigue Sigue Sputnik Rare & Unreleased

[Compilation #189]

Download the brand new PToS online compilation: Sigue Sigue Sputnik Rare & Unreleased.

This compilation includes rare and unreleased Sigue Sigue Sputnik songs, reversions and official remixes.
